channel.title: scheme on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content in scheme on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: ISRO Assistant Rajbhasha Vacancy 2025
item.description: ISRO has invited online applications for Assistant (Rajbhasha) posts through Advertisement No. SAC:02:2025. A total of 07 vacancies are available across ISRO Centres and IIST. Candidates must have a Graduation degree with 60% marks, along with Hindi typing speed of 25 w.p.m. and computer proficiency. The age limit is 18 to 28 years as on 02 October 2025. The online application process is open from 12 September 2025 to 02 October 2025. All candidates must pay ₹500 as the application fee, which will be refunded fully or partially depending on category. Selection will be done through a Written Test and Skill Test.

item.title: DSSSB Assistant Teacher (Primary) Vacancy 2025
item.description: Delhi Subordinate Services Selection Board (DSSSB) has released Notification No. 05/2025 for 1180 Assistant Teacher (Primary) posts. Eligible candidates can apply online from 17th September to 16th October 2025. Selection will be done through a computer-based examination.

item.title: SSC CGL Tier - I Admit Card 2025 – Download Link & Exam Date Notice
item.description: SSC CGL 2025 में आवेदन करने के लिए उम्मीदवार के पास किसी मान्यता प्राप्त विश्वविद्यालय से स्नातक डिग्री होना आवश्यक है। जूनियर स्टैटिस्टिकल ऑफिसर पद के लिए 10+2 स्तर पर गणित में न्यूनतम 60% अंक या स्नातक डिग्री में सांख्यिकी एक विषय होना चाहिए। स्टैटिस्टिकल इन्वेस्टिगेटर ग्रेड-II के लिए भी स्नातक में सांख्यिकी अनिवार्य विषय होना चाहिए। रिसर्च असिस्टेंट (NHRC) और अन्य सभी पदों के लिए किसी भी स्ट्रीम में स्नातक डिग्री मान्य है।

item.title: BHEL Artisan Vacancy 2025 Exam Date Out
item.description: Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL) has announced 515 vacancies for Artisan Grade IV posts under various trades such as Fitter, Welder, Turner, Machinist, Electrician, Electronics Mechanic, and Foundryman for the year 2025. These vacancies are spread across multiple BHEL units like BAP, HPVP, HEEP, TP, and others. Candidates must have passed Class 10th along with ITI (NTC) and NAC in the respective trade. A minimum of 60% marks is required for General and OBC candidates, and 55% for SC/ST in both qualifications. This recruitment offers a great opportunity for skilled ITI holders to join one of India’s leading public sector enterprises.

item.title: Join Indian Coast Guard Navik/Yantrik CGEPT 2026 Admit Card Out
item.description: भारतीय तटरक्षक बल ने CGEPT 01/2026 और 02/2026 के तहत नविक (GD/DB) और यांत्रिक पदों पर कुल 520 पदों पर भर्ती निकाली है। योग्यता के अनुसार 10वीं, 12वीं (फिजिक्स/मैथ्स) या डिप्लोमा धारक उम्मीदवार आवेदन कर सकते हैं। सभी श्रेणियों के लिए रिक्तियां उपलब्ध हैं। आवेदन प्रक्रिया ऑनलाइन है।

item.title: ECIL Technical Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Electronics Corporation of India Limited (ECIL) has invited applications for 160 Technical Officer posts on contract basis through Advt. No. 17/2025. The contract is initially for 9 months and extendable up to 4 years based on project needs. Candidates with BE/B.Tech. in ECE, EEE, CSE, IT, Mechanical and related disciplines with minimum 1-year post-qualification experience are eligible. The salary ranges from ₹25,000 to ₹31,000 per month along with PF, TA/DA, paid leave and medical benefits. The selection will be done on the basis of academic marks, work experience and personal interview (no written exam). The online application window will remain open from 16th September to 22nd September 2025 at www.ecil.co.in

item.title: UPPSC APO Recruitment 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released the official notification for Assistant Prosecution Officer (APO) Recruitment 2025 with 182 vacancies. Eligible candidates with a Law degree (LLB) can apply online from 16 September 2025 to 16 October 2025 through the UPPSC portal. The selection process includes Prelims, Mains, and Interview, followed by document verification and medical examination. Applicants must be between 21 to 40 years of age as on 1 July 2025. The pay scale ranges from Rs. 47,600 to Rs. 1,51,100, offering a great career opportunity for law graduates in Uttar Pradesh.

item.title: NFR Sports Quota Recruitment 2025
item.description: The Northeast Frontier Railway (NFR) has released the notification for Sports Quota Recruitment 2025-26 with a total of 56 vacancies across Level 1 to Level 5 posts. Eligible Indian sportspersons can apply online from 16 September 2025 to 15 October 2025. The recruitment is open in various sports disciplines including athletics, boxing, cricket, football, volleyball, weightlifting, basketball, archery, and more. Candidates will be selected based on their sports performance and trials, as no written exam will be conducted. The application fee is ₹500 for General candidates and ₹250 for SC/ST/Women/Minority/EBC, with partial refund available after appearing in trials.

item.title: IB Security Assistant/Executive Exam City 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), has released a notification for the recruitment of Security Assistant/Executive posts for the year 2025. A total of 4987 vacancies are available across various states and Union Territories. Candidates must have passed 10th standard, possess knowledge of the local language/dialect, and hold a domicile certificate of the region applied for. The post offers a Level-3 pay scale (₹21,700 – ₹69,100) along with special allowances. This is a central government Group ‘C’ non-gazetted, non-ministerial post, offering job security and growth in the intelligence sector. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official portal before the last date.

item.title: Indian Airforce Agniveervayu Intake 02/2026 Exam City 2025
item.description: The Indian Air Force has released the notification for Agniveervayu Intake 02/2026 under the Agnipath Scheme. Eligible male and female candidates can apply online for the Agniveer Vayu post. The recruitment is open to candidates from both science and non-science backgrounds. Selection will be based on an online test, physical fitness test, and medical examination.

item.title: Rajasthan Police Constable Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: Rajasthan Police has announced 167 Constable vacancies under the Sports Quota for 2025. Eligible candidates who cleared the Senior Secondary Level CET 2024 can apply online from 12/09/2025 to 01/10/2025. The selection will be based on CET score, sports achievements, and physical standards. Applications can be submitted via E-Mitra kiosks, CSC centers, or the Rajasthan Police website.

item.title: RRB Section Controller Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has announced 368 vacancies for Section Controller posts through CEN 04/2025. The online application process will be open from 15 September to 14 October 2025. Candidates with a graduation degree and age between 20 to 33 years can apply. Selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test, skill test (if required), document verification, and medical examination. The post offers a Level 6 pay scale with attractive allowances.

item.title: Delhi DDA Recruitment 2025
item.description: The Delhi Development Authority (DDA) has released its Recruitment Notification 2025 for a total of 1732 vacancies across various posts including Deputy Director, Assistant Director, Junior Engineer, Stenographer, Patwari, Mali, and Multi Tasking Staff (MTS). The online application process is scheduled from 06 October 2025 to 05 November 2025, and the Computer Based Test (CBT) is expected in December 2025 – January 2026. Candidates can apply online through the official DDA website. The recruitment includes category-wise vacancies (UR, EWS, SC, ST, OBC) and posts for ESM / PwBD candidates. Qualifications vary by post, ranging from 10th/12th pass to Graduate/Degree holders in relevant fields.

item.title: SBI Clerk (Junior Associate) Prelims Admit Card 2025 Out
item.description: State Bank of India (SBI) has released the official notification for Junior Associate (Customer Support & Sales) recruitment under Advertisement No. CRPD/CR/2025-26/06. A total of 5583 vacancies have been announced, including 5180 regular and 403 backlog posts, to be filled across various states. The online application process will be open from 06 August to 26 August 2025. Candidates must hold a graduation degree in any discipline, with final year students also eligible to apply provisionally. The age limit is 20 to 28 years as on 01 April 2025, with age relaxation applicable as per government rules. The selection process includes an online Preliminary Exam, Main Exam, and a Local Language Proficiency Test (if applicable). The Preliminary exam is expected in September 2025, and the Main exam in November 2025. The starting basic salary is ₹26,730/-, with gross monthly emoluments of around ₹46,000/- in metro cities. The application fee is ₹750/- for General/OBC/EWS, while it is exempted for SC/ST/PwBD/Ex-servicemen. Selected candidates will be posted in the state/circle they apply for, and no inter-state transfer will be allowed. Interested candidates can apply online through the SBI official website: https://sbi.co.in/web/careers.

item.title: UP Police Sub Inspector SI Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has announced the UP Police Sub Inspector (SI) Recruitment 2025. The online application process will be open from 12 August 2025 to 11 September 2025, and fee adjustments for submitted payments can be made until 13 September 2025. The application fee is ₹500/- for General, EWS, and OBC candidates, while SC and ST candidates will have to pay ₹400/-. The recruitment is for posts in Uttar Pradesh, and applications must be submitted online.

item.title: IOCL Junior Engineer Vacancy 2025
item.description: IOCL Junior Engineer / Officer (Grade E0) Recruitment 2025 invites applications from Indian nationals with a 3-year diploma in Chemical, Mechanical, Electrical, or Instrumentation Engineering. Candidates must meet the minimum marks criteria (65% for General/EWS/OBC-NCL, 55% for SC/ST/PwBD) and age limits as per category. The selection process includes a Computer Based Test (CBT), followed by document verification and medical examination. Online applications start on 12/09/2025 and close on 28/09/2025. Pay scale for the post is ₹30,000 – ₹1,20,000/-. Reserved category candidates may have relaxations in age and marks.

item.title: IOB Specialist Officers Vacancy Online Form 2025
item.description: Indian Overseas Bank (IOB) has released a notification for the recruitment of 127 Specialist Officers in MMG Scale II & III across various departments, including IT, Risk, Information Security, Treasury, Corporate Credit, Software Engineering, and Data Science. Eligible candidates can apply online from 12.09.2025 to 03.10.2025 at www.iob.in. Age, educational qualifications, and post-qualification experience will be considered as on 01.09.2025. Reservation for SC, ST, OBC, EWS, and PwBD candidates will be as per Government norms. Application fees are ₹1000 for General/OBC/EWS and ₹175 for SC/ST/PwBD candidates.

item.title: MHA Intelligence Bureau ACIO Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), has announced the recruitment of 3717 posts for Assistant Central Intelligence Officer (ACIO) Grade-II / Executive. This is a Group ‘C’, Non-Gazetted, and Non-Ministerial post offering candidates a prestigious opportunity to work with India’s internal intelligence agency. Applicants must possess a Bachelor’s Degree in any stream from a recognized university in India. The selection process involves a written examination followed by an interview. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official MHA website.

item.title: SBI Manager (Credit Analyst) Vacancy Online Form 2025
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has released the SCO Recruitment 2025 notification for 63 Manager (Credit Analyst) posts in MMGS-III. Eligible candidates with MBA (Finance)/CA/CFA/ICWA and minimum 3 years’ corporate credit experience can apply online from 11th September to 2nd October 2025. Selection will be through shortlisting and interview, with postings anywhere in India.

item.title: Army AFMS Medical Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Indian Army Armed Forces Medical Services (AFMS) has announced 225 vacancies for Short Service Commission (SSC) Medical Officers in 2025. Eligible MBBS/PG candidates can apply online at join.afms.gov.in between 13 September and 3 October 2025. Selection will be based on NEET PG scores, interview, and medical tests.

item.title: RRC SR Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell (Southern Railway) has released the Sports Quota Recruitment 2025 for Level 1 to 5 posts, with a total of 67 vacancies. Candidates with educational qualifications ranging from 10th Pass/ITI to Graduate are eligible to apply depending on the post. The age limit for applicants is 18–25 years as of 1 January 2026, with age relaxation as per government rules. The application fee is Rs 500 for General/OBC/EWS and Rs 250 for SC/ST/PWD/ESM/Female candidates, which is refundable. Interested candidates must apply online through the official website rrcmas.in. The application process starts on 13 September 2025 and closes on 12 October 2025, while the trials date will be notified later.

item.title: BPSC Lower Division Clerk LDC Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Lower Division Clerk (LDC) posts with a total of 26 vacancies. Candidates who have passed Intermediate (10+2) in any stream from a recognized board and possess computer operation and typing skills are eligible to apply. This recruitment is primarily for domicile candidates of Bihar, who will receive reservation benefits as per their category. Candidates from other states can also apply but will be considered under the General (Unreserved) category only, without any reservation or age relaxation. The application process is completely online. Out of the total posts, 13 are for General, 3 for EWS, 4 for SC, 1 for ST, 2 for EBC, 2 for BC, and 1 for BC Female.

item.title: SBI Manager & Deputy Manager Vacancy 2025
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has announced the SBI SCO Recruitment 2025 for a total of 59 Specialist Cadre Officer vacancies on a regular basis, including the posts of Manager (MMGS-III) and Deputy Manager (MMGS-II) in the Digital Platforms domain. Candidates must hold a B.E./B.Tech. in IT, Computer Science, Electronics, Electrical, or related fields, or an MCA with at least 60% marks, while an MBA is preferred. Relevant work experience of 5 years for Manager and 3 years for Deputy Manager in Digital Payments, FinTech, CRM, or related fields is mandatory. The age limit is 28–35 years for Manager and 25–32 years for Deputy Manager (as on 31.08.2025). The application fee is ₹750 for General, OBC, and EWS candidates, while SC, ST, and PwBD candidates are exempted. The selection process will be based on shortlisting and interview. Eligible candidates can apply online from 11th September to 2nd October 2025 through the official SBI Careers website.

item.description:

item.title: BOM Specialist Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of Maharashtra has announced Specialist Officer Recruitment 2025 (Phase II) for Scale II to VI posts in IT, Credit, Legal, Risk, Treasury, and other departments. Online applications are open from 10th to 30th September 2025.

item.title: RRC ER Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: RRC Eastern Railway has announced 50 vacancies under Sports Quota Recruitment 2025-26 for Group C and D posts. Eligible sportspersons can apply online from 10th September to 9th October 2025, and selection will be through field trials and document verification.

item.title: RBI Officer Grade B Vacancy 2025
item.description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced 120 vacancies for Grade B Officers in General, DEPR, and DSIM streams. The application window will remain open from 10 September to 30 September 2025. Phase I examination is scheduled on 18–19 October 2025, while Phase II will be held on 6–7 December 2025. Candidates must carefully read the official notification for detailed eligibility criteria, qualifications, age limit, and application fees before applying online.

item.title: RRC SR Scouts & Guides Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: Southern Railway and Integral Coach Factory (ICF) invite applications from Indian citizens who are active members of Bharat Scouts & Guides for recruitment to Level-1 posts under the Scouts & Guides Quota for the year 2025-26. A total of 14 posts are available—12 in Southern Railway (2 posts each in Chennai, Tiruchchirappalli, Madurai, Palakkad, Thiruvananthapuram, and Salem) and 2 in ICF. Candidates must have a minimum educational qualification of 10th pass, ITI, or National Apprenticeship Certificate (NAC) from NCVT. The age limit varies by category: UR 18–33 years, OBC 18–36 years, and SC/ST 18–38 years as on 01-01-2026. The selection process includes a Written Test / Computer Based Test (CBT). The application fee is Rs. 500 for general candidates and Rs. 250 for reserved categories, refundable after appearing in the exam. These posts are open to all communities, and eligible candidates can apply online from 30.08.2025 to 29.09.2025.

item.title: Railway RRB Group D Exam Date 2025
item.description: Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially announced the RRB Group D Exam Date 2025. The CBT will be conducted from 17 November 2025 to the end of December 2025. City intimation slips will be released around 10 days before the exam and admit cards will be available 4 days prior. Candidates must regularly check their respective RRB regional websites for latest updates and instructions.

item.title: BPSC Assistant Public Sanitation & Waste Management Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) invites online applications for 54 posts of Assistant Public Sanitation & Waste Management Officer under the Department of Urban Development & Housing, Bihar. Candidates from all states of India, both male and female, are eligible. Required qualifications include a Bachelor’s degree in Chemistry/Environmental Science, B.E./B.Tech in Chemical/Civil/Environmental Science/Public Health Engineering/Biotechnology, or a degree in Planning/Architecture. Age limit (as of 01.08.2025) is 21–37 years for unreserved males, 21–40 years for unreserved females/OBC/EBC, and 21–42 years for SC/ST. Application fee is ₹100 (plus ₹200 biometric fee if Aadhaar is not provided). Apply online between 05.09.2025 and 30.09.2025 at www.bpsc.bihar.gov.in

item.title: Bihar PCS 71st Admit Card 2025 Out
item.description: बिहार लोक सेवा आयोग (BPSC) ने 71वीं संयुक्त प्रतियोगिता परीक्षा (CCE) 2025 का नोटिफिकेशन जारी कर दिया है। यह परीक्षा विभिन्न प्रशासनिक पदों जैसे DSP, SDM, बीडीओ, राजस्व अधिकारी आदि के लिए आयोजित की जाती है। आवेदन प्रक्रिया ऑनलाइन मोड में होगी और सभी भारत के योग्य उम्मीदवार आवेदन कर सकते हैं।

item.title: SCI Assistant Manager & Executive Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd. (SCI) has invited applications for 75 vacancies of Assistant Manager (E2) and Executive (E0). The online application process will run from 06 September 2025 to 27 September 2025. Maximum age limit is 27 years (with relaxations as per Govt. norms). The selection process includes Online Test, Group Discussion, and Personal Interview. Application fee is ₹500 for UR/OBC-NCL/EWS and ₹100 for SC/ST/PwBD/ESM. Interested candidates can apply online through the official website shipindia.com

item.title: Indian Oil Engineers/Officers Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL) has announced recruitment for Engineers/Officers (Grade A) in Chemical, Electrical, and Instrumentation disciplines through CBT 2025. Eligible candidates with B.Tech./B.E. degrees can apply online from 05/09/2025 to 21/09/2025, admit card will be available from 17/10/2025, and the CBT will be held on 31/10/2025.

item.title: IB Security Assistant Motor Transport Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB) has invited online applications for 455 Security Assistant (Motor Transport) posts under the Ministry of Home Affairs. Eligible 10th pass candidates with a valid LMV driving license can apply from 6 to 28 September 2025. The selection will be based on an online exam, driving test, and interview, with a salary of ₹21,700–69,100 plus allowances.

item.title: RSSB Patwari Bharti 2025 Answer Key Out
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSMSSB) has released the notification for Patwari Bharti 2025. A total of 3705 vacancies are available, including 522 posts for TSP areas and 3183 posts for Non-TSP areas. Candidates must have a Bachelor’s Degree and a recognized Computer qualification such as NIELIT O Level, COPA, RS-CIT, or a Diploma/Degree in Computer Science/Application.

item.title: RRB Paramedical Various Posts Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB), Ministry of Railways, Government of India, has released the Centralized Employment Notice (CEN No. 03/2025) for Paramedical Categories Recruitment 2025 with a total of 434 vacancies across various posts including Nursing Superintendent, Pharmacist, Dialysis Technician, ECG Technician, Radiographer, and Lab Assistant. The online application process will begin on 09 August 2025 and will remain open until 08 September 2025 (11:59 PM). The educational qualifications vary by post, ranging from 10+2 with Diploma/Certificate to B.Sc. in relevant fields, and the age limit is 18 to 40 years as on 01 January 2026. The selected candidates will receive a salary ranging between ₹21,700 and ₹44,900 as per the 7th CPC Pay Matrix (Level 2 to Level 7). The selection process will consist of a Computer Based Test (CBT), Document Verification, and a Medical Examination. Candidates can apply through the official RRB regional websites such as rrbahmedabad.gov.in and others.

item.title: Indian Coast Guard Assistant Commandant AC Exam City & Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Indian Coast Guard has released the notification for Assistant Commandant Recruitment 2025. A total of 170 vacancies are available under two main branches: General Duty (GD) with 140 posts and Technical (Engineering/Electrical) with 30 posts. Eligible male candidates with a graduate degree and Physics & Maths at 10+2 level can apply for GD, while candidates with an engineering degree in relevant disciplines can apply for the Technical branch. The application process is online through the official website joinindiancoastguard.cdac.in. This is a prestigious Group ‘A’ Gazetted Officer post under the Ministry of Defence, Government of India.

item.title: UPSC CDS II Admit Card 2025 Out
item.description: Combined Defence Services (CDS) II Exam 2025

item.title: UPSC NDA 2 Admit Card 2025 Out
item.description: UPSC National Defence Academy and Naval Academy NDA II Examination 2025 Apply Online Form

item.title: UPSC EPFO Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) has released the Special Advertisement No. 52/2025 for direct recruitment to a total of 230 vacancies in the Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) under the Ministry of Labour and Employment. These include 156 posts of Enforcement Officer/Accounts Officer (EO/AO) and 74 posts of Assistant Provident Fund Commissioner (APFC). Candidates must hold a Bachelor’s Degree from a recognized university. For the APFC post, qualifications such as a degree in Law, MBA, CA, or equivalent are desirable. The online application process will begin on July 29, 2025, and close on August 18, 2025. Selection will be based on a written examination, and postings will be across India. Interested candidates can apply online at https://upsconline.nic.in.

item.title: UPPSC Assistant Professor Vacancy 2025
item.description: UPPSC has announced Assistant Professor Recruitment 2025 for 1253 posts in Government Degree Colleges. Online applications are open from 4 September to 6 October 2025. Candidates with a PG degree and UGC-NET can apply

item.title: SBI Probationary Officers PO Mains Admit Card 2025 Out
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has released the notification for the recruitment of 541 Probationary Officer (PO) posts, including 500 regular posts and 41 backlog posts. Candidates must have a Bachelor’s degree in any stream from a recognized university in India to be eligible. The category-wise distribution of vacancies is as follows: UR – 203, OBC – 135, EWS – 50, SC – 80, and ST – 73. The vacancies include 777 posts in the Male Branch, 694 posts in the Female Branch, 45 posts in Sparsh Government Inter College for Special Education, and 2 posts in the Uttar Pradesh Jail Training School (Teaching Staff). Candidates must possess a Post Graduate degree in the relevant subject along with a B.Ed. from an NCTE-recognized institution, with additional qualifications required for special and jail training school posts. The online application process will run from 12 August 2025 to 12 September 2025, and selection will be conducted through a Preliminary Examination, Main Written Examination, and Document Verification.

item.title: HPSC Assistant District Attorney ADA Vacancy 2025
item.description: HPSC has announced 255 Assistant District Attorney (ADA) vacancies under Advt. No. 18/2025. The online application process will run from 13 August to 2 September 2025 through the official website hpsc.gov.in. Candidates must hold an LLB degree and meet the age criteria of 21–42 years. The selection process includes a screening test and a subject knowledge test. The post carries a pay scale of FPL-9 (₹53,100–₹1,67,800).

item.title: HPSC AE, Municipal Engineer & Sub Divisional Engineer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Haryana Public Service Commission (HPSC) has announced 153 Civil Engineer vacancies in various departments including Public Works (B&R), Municipal Corporation, and Panchayati Raj. The posts include Assistant Engineer, Municipal Engineer, and Sub Divisional Engineer for candidates holding a B.E./B.Tech in Civil Engineering (AICTE approved). The online application process will start from 12 August 2025 and will remain open until 1 September 2025, 5:00 PM. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official HPSC website.

item.title: IBPS Probationary Officer PO 15th Pre Exam 2025 – Check Exam Date & Pattern
item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for CRP PO/MT-XV Recruitment 2025 for the post of Probationary Officer (PO)/Management Trainee (MT). A total of 5208 vacancies have been announced across 8 participating public sector banks. Candidates who hold a Bachelor’s Degree in any discipline from a recognized university in India are eligible to apply. The recruitment process includes a preliminary exam, main exam, and interview. Applications must be submitted online through the official IBPS website www.ibps.in. Selected candidates will be appointed across various locations in India.

item.title: RBI Officers Grade A & B Admit Card 2025 – Download Hall Ticket
item.description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced 28 vacancies for various Grade A and B Officer posts under the 2025 recruitment drive. The available posts include Law Officer, Manager (Technical – Civil and Electrical), Assistant Manager (Rajbhasha), and Assistant Manager (Protocol & Security). Candidates applying for these positions must meet the minimum educational qualifications such as LLB, BE/B.Tech, Master’s Degree, or have military experience, along with relevant work experience where required. This is a great opportunity for eligible candidates to join the RBI as an officer and contribute to the nation’s central banking system. Interested applicants can submit their applications through the official RBI website within the given deadline.

item.title: Union Bank SO (Wealth Manager) Vacancy 2025
item.description: Union Bank of India has announced the Wealth Manager Recruitment 2025 for 250 Specialist Officer (MMGS-II) vacancies. The post offers a pay scale of ₹64,820–₹93,960 plus allowances, with an approximate CTC of ₹21 lakh in Mumbai. Candidates must be between 25 and 35 years of age as on 1 August 2025, hold a full-time 2-year MBA/MMS/PGDBA/PGDBM/PGPM/PGDM from a recognized institution, and have at least 3 years of experience in Wealth Management at the Officer/Manager level. Desirable certifications include NISM, IRDAI, NCFM, or AMFI. The application process will be open from 5 August to 25 August 2025, with fees of ₹177 for SC/ST/PwBD candidates and ₹1,180 for others. The selection process may include an online examination, group discussion, and personal interview. Selected candidates will serve a probation period of 2 years and must sign a service bond to serve the bank for a minimum of 3 years or pay ₹2,50,000 plus taxes if leaving early.

item.title: Bank of Baroda Sales Manager & Agriculture Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of Baroda has announced its Recruitment Drive 2025 for a total of 417 vacancies across two departments—Retail Liabilities and Rural & Agri Banking. The available posts include Manager – Sales, Officer – Agriculture Sales, and Manager – Agriculture Sales. The online application process begins on 6th August 2025 and closes on 26th August 2025. Candidates must hold relevant educational qualifications such as a graduation degree (with preference for MBA/PGDM in Sales/Marketing) or a 4-year degree in Agriculture-related fields. Prior work experience in sales or agri-sales (preferably in the BFSI sector) is mandatory. The selection process may include an online test, psychometric assessment, group discussion, and/or interview. Selected candidates will be posted anywhere in India and must commit to a 3-year service bond. Interested applicants are advised to visit the official Bank of Baroda website to read the full notification and apply online.

item.title: Chandigarh JBT Teacher Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Samagra Shiksha, Chandigarh has released a notification for the recruitment of 218 Junior Basic Teacher (JBT) posts for Primary Classes (I to V). Candidates from across India are eligible to apply. The minimum qualification includes a Graduation degree from a recognized university, a 2-year Diploma in Elementary Education (D.El.Ed.) recognized by NCTE, and passing the CTET (Paper-I). The salary for the post is fixed at ₹45,260 per month. The application process is online and will begin on 07 August 2025 and end on 28 August 2025 (5:00 PM), while the last date to pay the fee is 30 August 2025 (2:00 PM). The application fee is ₹1000 for General/OBC/EWS, ₹500 for SC, and exempted for PWD candidates. The selection will be done through a written objective type test of 150 marks, with no interview. Category-wise distribution includes 111 posts for General, 44 for OBC, 41 for SC, and 22 for EWS candidates. Interested applicants must visit the official website ssachd.nic.in to apply and read the full notification.

item.title: RPSC Veterinary Officer Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has announced 1100 vacancies for the post of Veterinary Officer under the Animal Husbandry Department. The recruitment is open to candidates holding a Bachelor’s Degree in Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry or its equivalent from a recognized university in India, along with knowledge of Hindi in Devanagari script and Rajasthani culture. The application process will be conducted online, starting from 5 August 2025 and closing on 3 September 2025. The vacancies are distributed among various categories, including General (360), SC (198), ST (183), OBC (209), MBC (50), and EWS (100), with a total of 1100 posts available

item.title: Haryana HPSC ADO Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Haryana Public Service Commission (HPSC) has released the notification for the recruitment of 785 Agricultural Development Officer (ADO) posts under the Administrative Cadre (Group-B) in the Agriculture and Farmers Welfare Department, Haryana. Candidates possessing a B.Sc. (Hons) in Agriculture and having studied Hindi or Sanskrit up to Matric or higher are eligible to apply. The online application process will begin on 5th August 2025 and will remain open until 25th August 2025 (up to 5:00 PM). Applicants must be between 18 to 42 years of age as on 01 July 2025. The selected candidates will be placed in Pay Level-6 of the 7th CPC pay matrix, with a salary range of ₹35,400 to ₹1,12,400. All 27 PwBD reserved posts are included in the total of 785 vacancies. Interested candidates can apply through the official HPSC website at hpsc.gov.in. Category-wise vacancy breakup, reservation rules, fee details, and application instructions are available in the official notification.

item.title: SSC Multi Tasking Staff MTS Vacancy 2025- Correction
item.description: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) and Havaldar Recruitment 2025. Eligible 10th pass candidates can apply online for these posts. The selection includes CBT and Physical Test (for Havaldar). Check complete details including eligibility, age limit, application dates, and how to apply.

item.title: RRC Western Railway Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC), Western Railway has released a notification for Sports Quota Recruitment 2025-26, inviting online applications from eligible sportspersons across India. A total of 64 vacancies will be filled, which include 5 posts under Level 5/4 (Group C) for graduates, 16 posts under Level 3/2 (Group C) for candidates with 12th pass, ITI, Diploma, or Apprenticeship, and 43 posts under Level 1 (Group D) for candidates who have passed 10th, ITI, NAC, or hold a Diploma. The recruitment is open for various disciplines such as Cricket, Kabaddi, Wrestling, Athletics, Football, Basketball, and more. The selection will be based on sports achievements and trial performance—no written exam will be conducted. The online application process begins on 30 July 2025 and will close on 29 August 2025 via the official website www.rrc-wr.com.

item.title: Indian Navy SSC Executive (IT) Vacancy Jan 2026
item.description: Commission (SSC) in Information Technology (Executive Branch) for the January 2026 course. A total of 15 vacancies are available. Applicants must hold a degree in BE/B.Tech/M.Tech/MCA/MSc in Computer Science, Information Technology, Artificial Intelligence, Cyber Security, or related fields with a minimum of 60% marks, along with at least 60% marks in English in Class 10 or 12. Eligible candidates should be born between 02 January 2001 and 01 July 2006 (both dates inclusive). The online application window opens on 02 August 2025 and closes on 17 August 2025. The selection process includes shortlisting based on normalized marks, SSB interview, medical examination, and merit list. Selected candidates will be appointed as Sub Lieutenants and undergo training at the Indian Naval Academy (INA), Ezhimala, Kerala. The initial service tenure is 10 years, which may be extended up to 14 years (10+2+2) based on performance and service requirements. The basic pay starts at ₹56,100/- plus applicable allowances. For more details and to apply online, visit the official website: www.joinindiannavy.gov.in.

item.title: Bank of Baroda BOB Varios Post Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of Baroda has announced the recruitment of 330 contractual officers for various departments including Digital Banking, MSME Sales, and Risk Management. The online application process is open from 30th July to 19th August 2025. The posts include Assistant Manager, Deputy Manager, and AVP roles, requiring relevant educational qualifications and work experience. The selection will be based on shortlisting and personal interviews. Candidates must maintain a minimum CIBIL score of 680 and be willing to work anywhere in India.

item.title: SSC Combined Translator Exam 2025 Online Form
item.description: कर्मचारी चयन आयोग (SSC) ने जूनियर हिंदी अनुवादक (JHT), सीनियर हिंदी अनुवादक (SHT) और अन्य पदों पर भर्ती हेतु अधिसूचना जारी की है। पात्र अभ्यर्थी ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं।

item.title: SCI Court Master Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Supreme Court of India has invited online applications for 30 posts of Court Master (Shorthand) in 2025. Eligible candidates must be between 30 to 45 years of age and hold a graduate degree with shorthand speed of 120 w.p.m. and computer typing speed of 40 w.p.m., along with at least 5 years of experience in a relevant government or public sector post. The selection process includes a Shorthand Test, Written Test, Typing Speed Test, and Interview. Candidates with a law degree will receive additional weightage. Applications can be submitted online through the official website of the Supreme Court at www.sci.gov.in.

item.title: UPPSC Assistant Teacher Bharti 2025
item.description: The Directorate of Medical Education and Research (DMER) has announced a recruitment drive for 7466 Assistant Teacher posts. Candidates must hold a Bachelor’s Degree in the relevant subject from any recognized university in India. Detailed eligibility criteria and subject-wise qualifications will be released soon. Interested applicants are advised to stay updated with the official notification and prepare to apply online as per the given schedule.

item.title: RPSC Assistant Agriculture Engineer AAE Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released the notification for the recruitment of Assistant Agriculture Engineer (AAE) 2025 with a total of 281 vacancies. Candidates must hold a Bachelor’s Degree in Agricultural Engineering from a recognized university to be eligible. Additionally, applicants should have a working knowledge of Hindi written in Devanagari script and a good understanding of Rajasthan’s culture. The online application process will be open from 28 July 2025 to 26 August 2025. Vacancies are distributed across various categories including General, OBC, SC, ST, EWS, and MBC. Candidates are advised to check the detailed notification and ensure they meet the eligibility criteria before applying

item.title: Railway RRB Technician 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released the RRB Technician Recruitment 2025 notification for Technician Grade-1 (Signal) and Technician Grade-3 (Open Line) posts. Around 6238 vacancies will be filled. Grade-1 requires a B.Sc, BE/B.Tech or 3-year diploma in Physics, Electronics, Computer Science, IT, or Instrumentation. Grade-3 requires 10th pass with ITI in relevant trade from NCVT/SCVT. Eligible candidates can apply online. Please read the official notification for full details.

item.title: UPSC Assistant Director (Systems) Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) has released Advertisement No. 10/2025 inviting online applications for the post of Assistant Director (Systems) in the Directorate of Income Tax (Systems), Department of Revenue, Ministry of Finance. A total of 45 vacancies are available under various categories including UR, EWS, OBC, SC, ST, and PwBD. The position is classified as Group ‘A’ Gazetted, Non-Ministerial and offers a Level-10 pay scale under the 7th CPC. Candidates with qualifications such as BE/B.Tech, M.Tech, MCA, or equivalent in Computer Science/Applications along with relevant experience in electronic data processing are eligible to apply. The role involves software development, debugging, maintenance, and supervision of technical staff. The headquarters is in New Delhi, but the selected candidates can be posted anywhere in India. The last date to apply online is 14 August 2025, and applications must be submitted through the official website https://upsconline.gov.in/ora/.

item.title: BSF Constable Sports Quota Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Border Security Force (BSF) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Constable (General Duty) under Sports Quota 2025. A total of 241 vacancies are available for meritorious male and female sportspersons who have participated at national or international levels. Candidates must have passed Class 10th (Matric) from a recognized board and must possess valid sports certificates. The application process is completely online and starts from 25 July 2025. Eligible candidates can apply before the last date, 20 August 2025. This is a golden opportunity for young sportspersons to serve in BSF with pride.

item.title: BSF Constable Tradesman Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Border Security Force (BSF) has released a notification for recruitment to various posts. This opportunity is open to both male and female candidates. The posts include Constable, Head Constable, ASI (Steno), and other technical and non-technical categories. Educational qualifications vary by post, such as 10th pass, 12th pass, or a diploma in the relevant trade. Candidates must meet the prescribed physical standards and go through the selection process, which includes a written examination, physical test, document verification, and medical examination.

item.title: Join Indian Army SSC Tech Men (66) April 2026
item.description: The Indian Army has invited applications for the 66th Short Service Commission (Technical) Men Entry for the course commencing in April 2026. A total of 350 vacancies are available for unmarried male engineering graduates in various disciplines including Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Computer Science, and others. Candidates must be between 20 to 27 years of age as on 01 April 2026. Final year students who will complete their degree before April 2026 are also eligible to apply. The selection process includes shortlisting of applications, SSB interview, medical examination, and merit list preparation. Selected candidates will undergo 49 weeks of training at the Officers Training Academy (OTA), Chennai, and will be commissioned as Lieutenants. During training, cadets will receive a stipend of ₹56,100 per month. The online application process will be open from 24 July 2025 to 22 August 2025 on the official website www.joinindianarmy.nic.in.

item.title: Indian Army SSCW Tech Recruitment 2025
item.description: ndian Army has announced SSCW (Tech) 66 Women Recruitment 2025, offering 31 vacancies for women candidates including engineering graduates and widows of Defence Personnel. Eligible unmarried women and widows can apply online from 23 July 2025 to 21 August 2025. The course will begin in April 2026 at Officers Training Academy (OTA), and selected candidates will undergo 49 weeks of training before commissioning as Lieutenants.

item.title: RSSB Platoon Commander Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has invited online applications for the post of Platoon Commander under the Rajasthan Home Guard Department. A total of 84 vacancies are available for this Group B, non-gazetted government job. Candidates must possess a graduation degree, along with knowledge of Hindi written in Devanagari script and familiarity with Rajasthan’s culture. Only those who have appeared in the CET (Graduation Level) 2024 exam are eligible to apply. Selected candidates will be placed under a 2-year probation period with fixed monthly remuneration. The pay scale is as per Pay Matrix Level-10 (₹9300–34800 + Grade Pay ₹3600). Applications are accepted online only through the official RSSB portal.

item.title: Bank of Baroda Various Posts Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of Baroda has released the official notification for the recruitment of 41 Specialist Officer posts on a regular basis across various departments including Digital Banking, Information Technology, Information Security, and Fire & Safety. The available positions include Manager, Senior Manager, Chief Manager, and Fire Safety Officer. Candidates must possess qualifications such as BE/B.Tech, MCA, or M.Sc in relevant disciplines, along with specific certifications like CEH, CISSP, or CISA for select roles. The application process is completely online and starts from 23 July 2025, with the last date being 12 August 2025. The selection may include an online test followed by a group discussion or personal interview. The jobs are regular and full-time, with postings across India. Interested candidates can apply through the official website www.bankofbaroda.in. Category-wise vacancy details (UR/SC/ST/OBC/EWS) have not been disclosed in the notification.

item.title: SGPGI Nursing Officer & Non Teaching Post 2025 Online Form
item.description: SGPGI लखनऊ द्वारा वर्ष 2025 में नर्सिंग ऑफिसर एवं विभिन्न गैर-शिक्षण पदों पर भर्ती हेतु अधिसूचना जारी की गई है। इस भर्ती के अंतर्गत कुल 1479 पदों पर भर्तियाँ की जाएंगी, जिनमें नर्सिंग ऑफिसर, हॉस्पिटल अटेंडेंट, स्टेनोग्राफर, अकाउंट्स ऑफिसर, टेक्निकल ऑफिसर, OT असिस्टेंट, CSSD असिस्टेंट, मेडिकल सोशल सर्विस ऑफिसर जैसे ग्रुप B एवं C श्रेणी के पद शामिल हैं। आवेदन हेतु शैक्षणिक योग्यता 10वीं, 12वीं, स्नातक, डिप्लोमा, B.Sc, B.Com, आदि मांगी गई है, साथ ही कुछ पदों के लिए कार्यानुभव भी आवश्यक है। इस भर्ती के लिए भारत के सभी राज्यों के उम्मीदवार आवेदन कर सकते हैं, लेकिन आरक्षण का लाभ केवल उत्तर प्रदेश के मूल निवासियों को मिलेगा। आवेदन प्रक्रिया केवल ऑनलाइन होगी, और वेतनमान पद के अनुसार निर्धारित होगा। इच्छुक उम्मीदवार विस्तृत जानकारी के लिए आधिकारिक अधिसूचना अवश्य पढ़ें।

item.title: SSC Selection Post Phase 13 Admitcard 2025
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the official notification for Selection Post Phase 13 Recruitment 2025, offering a total of 2,423 vacancies across various government departments and ministries. This recruitment drive is open to candidates with Matric (10th), Intermediate (12th), and Graduation level qualifications.

item.title: RSSB Village Development Officer VDO 2025 Online Form
item.description: राजस्थान कर्मचारी चयन बोर्ड (RSSB) द्वारा ग्राम विकास अधिकारी (VDO) पदों पर भर्ती के लिए अधिसूचना जारी कर दी गई है। इच्छुक और पात्र उम्मीदवार जो भारत के किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त विश्वविद्यालय से स्नातक हैं और जिनके पास O लेवल, COPA, DPCS, कंप्यूटर डिप्लोमा या RS-CIT प्रमाण पत्र है, वे इस भर्ती के लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। भर्ती से जुड़ी पात्रता, आयु सीमा, आवेदन तिथि, चयन प्रक्रिया और अन्य जानकारी के लिए आधिकारिक नोटिफिकेशन जरूर पढ़ें।

item.title: Aadhaar Operator / Supervisor Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Aadhaar Operator/Supervisor recruitment 2025 has been announced for various states across India. Eligible candidates with UIDAI certification can apply online through the official CSC Cloud Career portal. This opportunity is ideal for candidates looking to work at district levels in Aadhaar enrollment and update centers.

item.title: HRRL Various Posts Vacancy 2025
item.description: Hindustan Petroleum Rajasthan Refinery Limited (HRRL) has released a recruitment notification for 131 vacancies across various departments including Engineering (Chemical, Mechanical, Electrical, Civil, Instrumentation), HR, Finance, Legal, Fire & Safety, and Medical.

item.title: Indian Army SSC Tech Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Army has released the short notification for SSC Technical Entry 66th Course for Men and Women. A total of 379 vacancies are available, including 350 for men and 29 for women. The course will commence in April 2026 at Officers Training Academy (OTA), Chennai. Candidates with a Degree in Engineering (B.E. / B.Tech) in relevant disciplines are eligible to apply. The online application process will begin on 16 July 2025 and continue until 14 August 2025 through the official website joinindianarmy.nic.in. This is a great opportunity for aspiring engineers to join the Indian Army as Short Service Commission Officers.

item.title: Chandigarh High Court Reader (Legal) Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Punjab and Haryana High Court, Chandigarh has invited online applications for 60 posts of Reader (Legal). Eligible candidates must have 10+2 with 60% marks in English, an LL.B. degree, and computer proficiency. The selection process includes a written exam, computer proficiency test, and viva-voce. The application process is open from 14 July 2025 to 04 August 2025. Candidates are advised to check the official notification for detailed eligibility, syllabus, and instructions.

item.title: Chandigarh High Court Peon Vacancy 2025
item.description: Chandigarh High Court has invited online applications for 75 posts of Peon (Residential). Eligible candidates with 10th pass qualification, 1-year diploma in cooking/culinary arts, and 3 years of cooking experience can apply from 14 July to 4 August 2025 at www.highcourtchd.gov.in. Applicants from all states are eligible, but reservation and fee relaxation are available only for residents of Punjab, Haryana, and Chandigarh. Selection will be based on a practical test (80 marks) and interview (20 marks). Application fee is ₹700 for general and ₹600 for reserved categories.

item.title: Jharkhand SSC ANM Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Jharkhand Staff Selection Commission (JSSC) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Female Health Workers (A.N.M.) under the Regular and Backlog vacancies for the year 2025. A total of 3,181 posts are available, including 3,020 regular and 161 backlog vacancies. Only female candidates who are domicile of Jharkhand and have completed 10th (Matric) with at least 45% marks, along with 18 months A.N.M. training and registration in Jharkhand State Nursing Council, are eligible to apply. The application process will be conducted online through the official JSSC website. Interested and eligible candidates must read the official notification thoroughly and apply within the specified dates.

item.title: RSSB Lab Attendant Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has released the notification for Lab Attendant (Prayogshala Sahayak) Recruitment 2025. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website. This recruitment is a great opportunity for 10th pass candidates seeking government jobs in Rajasthan. Applicants must have a valid domicile of Rajasthan to claim reservation benefits; candidates from other states can apply under the unreserved category (UR). The selection process will include a written examination followed by document verification. Interested candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully and apply before the last date.

item.title: SBI CBO 2025 Exam Date/ Admitcard
item.description: SBI ने 2025 के लिए सर्कल बेस्ड ऑफिसर (CBO) भर्ती का नोटिफिकेशन जारी किया है। उम्मीदवारों को किसी भी विषय में स्नातक होना चाहिए और किसी बैंक में अधिकारी पद पर कम से कम 2 साल का अनुभव जरूरी है। आवेदनकर्ता को उस सर्कल की स्थानीय भाषा का ज्ञान होना चाहिए जिसमें वे आवेदन कर रहे हैं। चयन प्रक्रिया में ऑनलाइन परीक्षा, स्क्रीनिंग, इंटरव्यू और (जरूरत पड़ने पर) भाषा परीक्षण शामिल हैं।

  • Pay the Examination Fee Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking or Pay Offline Fee Payment Through E Challan Mode Only

Eligibility

  • Age Limit Details

  • Minimum Age: 18 Years.
  • Maximum Age: 25 Years.

Age relaxation as per rules of Bihar Police Advt No. : 01/2025.

item.title: IOB Local Bank Officer 2025 Admit Card Donwnload
item.description: IOB ने लोकल बैंक अधिकारी (LBO) भर्ती 2025 के लिए अधिसूचना जारी की है। इच्छुक उम्मीदवार 12/05/2025 से 31/05/2025 तक ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। पात्रता, चयन प्रक्रिया, वेतन और अन्य विवरण जानें Yojna Portal पर।

item.title: DSSSB 2025: Apply for Various Posts
item.description: DSSSB Various Post Recruitment 2025 has been announced for multiple vacancies in different departments under the Delhi Government, including posts like Malaria Inspector, Ayurvedic Pharmacist, PGT Teachers, Warder, Technician, and Laboratory Assistant. The minimum qualification ranges from Class 10th pass to Master’s degree, with specific experience and course requirements depending on the post. Eligible candidates from any state in India can apply online through dsssbonline.nic.in from 8th July 2025 to 7th August 2025. The job postings will be within Delhi only. The exam dates and admit cards will be released as per schedule, so applicants should read the official notification carefully and submit their applications before the last date.

item.description:

item.title: JPSC Assistant Public Prosecutor APO Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Jharkhand Public Service Commission (JPSC) has released the notification for 134 vacancies of Assistant Public Prosecutor (APO) for the year 2025. Candidates holding a Bachelor’s Degree in Law (LLB) from any recognized university in India are eligible to apply. The selection process will include written examinations and interviews. Interested candidates can apply online within the specified application dates. Category-wise vacancies are available for UR, BC-I, BC-II, EWS, SC, and ST candidates. For complete eligibility criteria and application details, refer to the official notification.

item.title: IBPS Hindi Officer Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for Hindi Officer (Rajbhasha Adhikari) Recruitment 2025 under Specialist Officer (SO) cadre. Eligible candidates with a Master’s degree in Hindi or English with the relevant language combination can apply online through the official IBPS website. The application process includes registration, form filling, and fee payment. Applicants are expected to have desirable translation experience in a banking or financial institution and proficiency in MS Word and Excel. The online registration, eligibility criteria, important dates, and complete details are available in the official notification. Interested candidates are advised to apply within the given timeline.

item.title: Indian Navy Agniveer MR Musician Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Navy has invited online applications for the post of Agniveer MR Musician 2025. Candidates must have passed Class 10 (Matric) with at least 50% marks and possess musical ability as specified in the official notification. The physical fitness test includes a 1.6 km run, squats (uthak baithak), push-ups, and bent knee sit-ups with separate benchmarks for male and female candidates. Interested aspirants are advised to check the complete eligibility criteria before applying.

item.title: UPPSC Computer Assistant Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Computer Assistant posts in 2025. A total of 13 vacancies have been announced for eligible male and female candidates across India. To apply, candidates must have passed 10+2 (Intermediate) along with either a valid “O” Level certificate from NIELIT or a Diploma in Computer Science. The minimum age required is 18 years, and selected candidates will receive an initial salary in the ₹25,500 – ₹81,100 pay scale (Level-4). The application process is online only and will be available soon on the official website uppsc.up.nic.in. Interested candidates are advised to regularly check the website for the release of the online form and notification.

item.title: SSC Junior Engineer JE Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for the Junior Engineer (JE) Recruitment 2025. The vacancies are available in various departments such as BRO, CPWD, CWC, MES, NTRO, and others for trades including Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical. Candidates must have a Diploma or Degree in the relevant engineering discipline. Some departments also require two years of work experience. The application process is completely online, and the selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (Paper 1), Paper 2, and Document Verification. This recruitment is open to both male and female candidates across India. Interested applicants can visit the official SSC website https://ssc.gov.in for more details and to apply online.

item.title: BPSC Bihar Special School Teacher 2025 Online Form
item.description: BPSC Bihar Special School Teacher Recruitment 2025 में भारत के सभी राज्यों के योग्य उम्मीदवार आवेदन कर सकते हैं। यह भर्ती बिहार लोक सेवा आयोग (BPSC) द्वारा आयोजित की जा रही है, और आवेदन के लिए अभ्यर्थी भारतीय नागरिक होना चाहिए। हालांकि, आरक्षण का लाभ केवल बिहार के मूल निवासियों को ही मिलेगा। अन्य राज्यों से आने वाले उम्मीदवारों को अनारक्षित (सामान्य) श्रेणी में माना जाएगा, भले ही वे अपने राज्य में आरक्षित वर्ग (SC/ST/OBC) में आते हों। आवेदन के लिए संबंधित शैक्षणिक योग्यता के साथ-साथ विशेष शिक्षा में RCI (Rehabilitation Council of India) से मान्यता प्राप्त डिप्लोमा या डिग्री तथा छह माह का विशेष प्रशिक्षण अनिवार्य है। इस प्रकार, सभी योग्य उम्मीदवार, चाहे वे बिहार से हों या किसी अन्य राज्य से, इस भर्ती प्रक्रिया में भाग ले सकते हैं, बशर्ते वे सभी निर्धारित शर्तों को पूरा करते हों।

item.title: Indian Navy B.Tech Officer Entry Scheme Jan 2026 Batch
item.description: Indian Navy has invited online applications for the 10+2 B.Tech Cadet Entry Scheme (January 2026 Batch). Eligible unmarried male and female candidates who have passed 12th with 70% marks in PCM and 50% in English can apply. Selected candidates will undergo a four-year B.Tech course at the Indian Naval Academy, Ezhimala, Kerala.

item.title: CG Vyapam Peon Bharti 2025 Online Form
item.description: Chhattisgarh Professional Examination Board (CG Vyapam) has released the MLV125 Recruitment 2025 notification for various Group D posts under the Department of Printing and Stationery, Raipur. A total of 19 vacancies are available for positions such as Darkroom Assistant, Pasting Boy, Auxiliary, Inkman/Inker, Junior Binder, Hamal, Sweeper, Watchman, Mortuary Attendant, and Helper. Candidates who have passed 5th or 8th class and possess relevant experience (as per the post) are eligible to apply. Both male and female candidates can submit their applications online through the official website of CG Vyapam. The online application process is open from 27 June 2025 to 25 July 2025. Applicants must ensure to review the official notification carefully and complete the form, including uploading documents and paying the fee online. The written exam is tentatively scheduled for 31 August 2025 at district centers like Raipur, Durg, and Bilaspur.

item.title: HVF Junior Technician Online Form 2025
item.description: Qualification: ITI (NAC/NTC/STC) in relevant trade or Class 10th with 2 years of experience (for some posts)

item.title: JSSC Secondary Teacher 2025 Online Form
item.description: JSSC Secondary Teacher Recruitment 2025 के लिए झारखंड राज्य के स्थायी निवासी एवं अन्य राज्य के पात्र अभ्यर्थी ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। झारखंड के निवासी आरक्षण का लाभ प्राप्त करेंगे, जबकि अन्य राज्य के उम्मीदवार अनारक्षित श्रेणी में माने जाएंगे। सभी अभ्यर्थियों को संबंधित विषय में स्नातकोत्तर डिग्री के साथ B.Ed., M.Ed., या समकक्ष योग्यताएं अनिवार्य हैं। तकनीकी विषयों के लिए MCA, M.Tech जैसी डिग्री के साथ B.Ed. आवश्यक है। आवेदन केवल JSSC की आधिकारिक वेबसाइट jssc.nic.in पर ऑनलाइन मोड से किया जा सकता है। स्थानीय भाषा की जानकारी और परीक्षा उत्तीर्ण करना आवश्यक होगा।

item.title: Rajasthan High Court Class IV (Peon) Vacancy 2025 - Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan High Court Class IV (Peon) Recruitment 2025 के अंतर्गत राजस्थान उच्च न्यायालय द्वारा चपरासी (Class IV) पदों पर भर्ती के लिए अधिसूचना जारी की गई है (विज्ञापन संख्या: रा.उ.न्या.जो./परीक्षा प्रकोष्ठ/अधीनस्थ न्यायालय/च.श्रे.क./2025/2349)। इस भर्ती के लिए अभ्यर्थी को किसी मान्यता प्राप्त बोर्ड से 10वीं (माध्यमिक) उत्तीर्ण होना आवश्यक है। साथ ही देवनागरी लिपि में हिंदी का व्यावहारिक ज्ञान और राजस्थान की संस्कृति की जानकारी भी अनिवार्य है। इस भर्ती में राजस्थान राज्य के अभ्यर्थी आवेदन कर सकते हैं, साथ ही अन्य राज्यों के उम्मीदवार भी आवेदन कर सकते हैं, लेकिन उन्हें अनारक्षित श्रेणी (Unreserved Category) में माना जाएगा और किसी प्रकार का आरक्षण प्राप्त नहीं होगा। आवेदन प्रक्रिया पूरी तरह ऑनलाइन होगी और विस्तृत जानकारी व आवेदन के लिए आधिकारिक वेबसाइट hcraj.nic.in पर विज़िट करें।

item.title: WCDC Bihar Various Post 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Women and Child Development Corporation (WCDC), Bihar has released the WCDC Bihar Various Post Recruitment 2025 notification for a total of 77 contractual vacancies. These include posts like Central Administrator, Case Worker, Para Legal Personnel / Lawyer, Para Medical Personnel, Psycho-Social Counsellor, and Office Assistant (with computer knowledge). Except for the Office Assistant post, all other posts are reserved exclusively for female candidates. Only women who are residents of Bihar are eligible to apply (male/female both can apply for Office Assistant). The application process is completely online and will remain open from 26 June 2025 to 18 July 2025 (up to 6:00 PM). Interested candidates can visit the official website wdc.bihar.gov.in for eligibility, category-wise vacancy details, and to submit their application.

item.title: SSC GD Constable Recruitment 2024, Download Result/Answerkey
item.description: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has relased General Duty GD Constable Notification 2024. Those candidates who are interested in this SSC GD Constable CAPFs, NIA, SSF and Rifleman (GD) in Assam Rifles Examination,2025 can apply online from Dates 05/09/2024 to 14/10/2024. Read the SSC GD Constable 2024 SSC GD Constable 2024 Exam City Details

item.title: JPSC Project Manager 2025 Online Form
item.description: JPSC Project Manager Online Form 2025 invites applications from eligible candidates for 30 posts under Jharkhand Public Service Commission. Applicants must have a Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering/Technology or in subjects like Economics, Statistics, Science, Commerce, Cost Accountancy, Sericulture, Food Technology, or Management from a recognized institution. This recruitment is primarily for residents of Jharkhand. The application process is completely online through the official website jpsc.gov.in.

item.title: SSC 10+2 CHSL 2025 Online Form
item.description: कर्मचारी चयन आयोग (SSC) द्वारा CHSL (10+2) भर्ती 2025 का नोटिफिकेशन जारी किया गया है। इस भर्ती के अंतर्गत लोअर डिवीजन क्लर्क (LDC), डाटा एंट्री ऑपरेटर (DEO), डाक सहायक (PA) व छंटाई सहायक (SA) जैसे पदों पर नियुक्तियाँ की जाएंगी। भारत के किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त बोर्ड से 12वीं (इंटरमीडिएट) उत्तीर्ण उम्मीदवार इसके लिए आवेदन कर सकते हैं। आवेदन प्रक्रिया पूरी तरह ऑनलाइन है।

item.title: AIIMS Delhi Junior Resident July 2025 Online Form
item.description: अखिल भारतीय आयुर्विज्ञान संस्थान (AIIMS), नई दिल्ली द्वारा जूनियर रेजिडेंट (Junior Resident – Non-Academic) पदों पर भर्ती के लिए जुलाई 2025 सत्र हेतु आवेदन आमंत्रित किए गए हैं। इस भर्ती में भारत के सभी राज्यों के MBBS या BDS डिग्रीधारी उम्मीदवार आवेदन कर सकते हैं, बशर्ते कि उन्होंने 30 जून 2025 तक अपनी इंटर्नशिप पूरी कर ली हो और संबंधित मेडिकल/डेंटल काउंसिल में पंजीकृत हों। आवेदन प्रक्रिया ऑनलाइन माध्यम से की जाएगी और चयन मेरिट आधारित होगा।

item.title: ISRO NRSC Recruitment 2025 Online Form
item.description: ISRO NRSC भर्ती 2025 के तहत भारतीय अंतरिक्ष अनुसंधान संगठन के राष्ट्रीय सुदूर संवेदन केंद्र (NRSC) द्वारा विभिन्न पदों पर भर्तियां निकाली गई हैं। कुल 12 प्रकार के पदों के लिए 34 रिक्तियाँ घोषित की गई हैं। इसमें अनुसंधान वैज्ञानिक (Research Scientist), प्रोजेक्ट साइंटिस्ट-I एवं B, प्रोजेक्ट एसोसिएट-I और जूनियर रिसर्च फेलो (JRF) शामिल हैं। इन पदों के लिए न्यूनतम योग्यता ME/M.Tech, MSc/M.Sc Tech, BE/B.Tech, या B.Sc रखी गई है, जो रिमोट सेंसिंग, जीआईएस, जियोइन्फॉर्मेटिक्स, भूविज्ञान, कृषि, वन विज्ञान, जलवायु विज्ञान, पर्यावरण विज्ञान, भौतिकी, कंप्यूटर साइंस आदि संबंधित विषयों में होनी चाहिए। कुछ पदों के लिए डॉक्टरेट डिग्री (PhD) की भी आवश्यकता है।

item.title: BSCB Bihar State Co-Operative Bank Assistant 2025 Online Form
item.description: बिहार स्टेट को-ऑपरेटिव बैंक लिमिटेड (BSCB) द्वारा ऑफिस असिस्टेंट (मल्टीपर्पस) के कुल 257 पदों पर भर्ती हेतु अधिसूचना जारी की गई है। इस भर्ती के लिए उम्मीदवारों के पास किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त विश्वविद्यालय से किसी भी स्ट्रीम में स्नातक डिग्री होनी चाहिए। आवेदन प्रक्रिया ऑनलाइन माध्यम से होगी, जिसकी प्रारंभिक और अंतिम तिथि जल्द ही आधिकारिक वेबसाइट पर जारी की जाएगी। इस भर्ती में बिहार राज्य के साथ-साथ अन्य राज्यों के पात्र अभ्यर्थी भी आवेदन कर सकते हैं, लेकिन आरक्षण का लाभ केवल बिहार के मूल निवासियों को ही मिलेगा। आयु सीमा, चयन प्रक्रिया और अन्य विवरण आधिकारिक अधिसूचना में स्पष्ट रूप से दिए जाएंगे।

item.title: CG Fire Department Recruitment 2025 Online Form
item.description: CG Fire Department Recruitment 2025 के अंतर्गत छत्तीसगढ़ अग्निशमन एवं आपातकालीन सेवा विभाग द्वारा फायरमैन, ड्राइवर एवं अन्य पदों पर भर्ती की जाएगी। इस भर्ती में केवल छत्तीसगढ़ राज्य के मूल निवासी ही आवेदन के पात्र होंगे। अभ्यर्थियों को न्यूनतम 10वीं पास होना अनिवार्य है, जबकि ड्राइवर पद के लिए वैध ड्राइविंग लाइसेंस भी आवश्यक होगा। आयु सीमा 01 जनवरी 2025 को आधार मानते हुए 18 से 35 वर्ष के बीच निर्धारित की गई है। चयन प्रक्रिया में शारीरिक परीक्षण, लिखित परीक्षा एवं दस्तावेज़ सत्यापन शामिल होंगे।

item.title: UPPSC Statistics Officer, Assistant Geologist 2025 Online Form
item.description: उत्तर प्रदेश लोक सेवा आयोग (UPPSC) ने सांख्यिकी अधिकारी और सहायक भूवैज्ञानिक पदों के लिए भर्ती अधिसूचना 2025 जारी की है। कुल 6 पदों पर भर्ती की जाएगी, जिसमें 4 पद सांख्यिकी अधिकारी और 2 पद सहायक भूवैज्ञानिक के लिए आरक्षित हैं। इन पदों के लिए अभ्यर्थियों के पास संबंधित विषय में मास्टर डिग्री या डिप्लोमा होना अनिवार्य है, जिसमें न्यूनतम अंकों की शर्तें लागू हैं (जैसे सांख्यिकी अधिकारी के लिए 55% अंक, और भूविज्ञान में 50%)। आवेदन प्रक्रिया पूरी तरह से ऑनलाइन होगी और भारत के सभी राज्यों के पात्र उम्मीदवार आवेदन कर सकते हैं, हालांकि आरक्षण एवं आयु में छूट का लाभ केवल उत्तर प्रदेश के मूल निवासियों को ही मिलेगा। अधिक जानकारी के लिए अभ्यर्थियों को आधिकारिक अधिसूचना अवश्य पढ़नी चाहिए।

item.title: Rajasthan HC Driver Recruitment 2025 Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan High Court has officially released the notification for Driver Recruitment 2025, inviting applications for a total of 58 vacancies. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official website hcraj.nic.in from 18 June to 7 July 2025. This recruitment drive offers a great opportunity for candidates seeking government jobs in the driving sector under the Rajasthan judiciary. Applicants are advised to carefully read the eligibility criteria, application process, and important dates mentioned in the official notification before applying.

item.title: Indian Navy PC Officer Recruitment Cadet Scheme Jan 2026 Online Form
item.description: उम्मीदवारों को किसी मान्यता प्राप्त बोर्ड से 10+2 (फिजिक्स, केमिस्ट्री, मैथ्स) में न्यूनतम 70% अंक और अंग्रेज़ी में कम से कम 50% अंक (10वीं या 12वीं में) होना अनिवार्य है। आवेदन वही अभ्यर्थी कर सकते हैं जिन्होंने JEE (Main) 2025 की परीक्षा दी है और जिनका नाम NTA द्वारा जारी All India Common Rank List (CRL) 2025 में शामिल है। चयन SSB कॉल अप के माध्यम से JEE रैंक के आधार पर किया जाएगा।

item.title: CG Abkari Aarakshak Bharti 2025 Online Form
item.description: CG Abkari Aarakshak Bharti 2025 invites applications for 200 Excise Constable posts. Eligible candidates who have passed 12th can apply online from June 4 to June 27, 2025. The written exam will be held on July 27, 2025. Applicants from all Indian states can apply, but only Chhattisgarh residents will receive reservation and age relaxation benefits. The recruitment will be conducted by CG Vyapam, and the selection process includes a written test and physical eligibility test.

item.title: SCI Programmer Vacancy 2025 Apply Online
item.description: Shipping Corporation of India (SCI) द्वारा Senior Court Assistant-cum-Senior Programmer और Junior Court Assistant-cum-Junior Programmer पदों पर भर्ती हेतु अधिसूचना जारी की गई है। कुल 26 पद हैं। सीनियर पद के लिए बी.टेक/एमसीए + 6 साल का अनुभव और जूनियर पद के लिए बी.टेक/बीसीए जैसी योग्यता मांगी गई है। चयनित अभ्यर्थियों को Level 6 और Level 8 के अनुसार वेतनमान मिलेगा। इच्छुक उम्मीदवार SCI की वेबसाइट पर जाकर ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं।

item.description: Only Bihar residents may be eligible for the Zila Parishad Technical Assistant 2025 post. Check the official notification for domicile rules.

item.title: UPPSC Staff Nurse (Unani) Online Application Form 2025
item.description: उत्तर प्रदेश लोक सेवा आयोग (UPPSC) द्वारा स्टाफ नर्स यूनानी भर्ती 2025 के लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन आमंत्रित किए गए हैं। इस भर्ती में योग्य पुरुष एवं महिला अभ्यर्थी यूनानी नर्सिंग से संबंधित योग्यता के आधार पर आवेदन कर सकते हैं। उत्तर प्रदेश के निवासी अभ्यर्थियों को आरक्षण का लाभ मिलेगा, जबकि अन्य राज्य के उम्मीदवार अनारक्षित श्रेणी में आवेदन कर सकते हैं। इच्छुक अभ्यर्थी निर्धारित तिथि से पहले आधिकारिक वेबसाइट के माध्यम से ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं।

item.title: Apply for UPSC ORA Vacancy 2025 – Operation Officer & Other Posts
item.description: संघ लोक सेवा आयोग (UPSC) ने ORA भर्ती 2025 के तहत ऑपरेशन ऑफिसर और अन्य विभिन्न पदों के लिए अधिसूचना जारी की है। आवेदन प्रक्रिया जून 2025 से शुरू होने की संभावना है और अंतिम तिथि जुलाई 2025 रहेगी। योग्य उम्मीदवार आधिकारिक वेबसाइट upsc.gov.in पर ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। भर्ती से संबंधित योग्यता, आयु सीमा और अन्य विवरण के लिए आधिकारिक नोटिफिकेशन जरूर पढ़ें।

item.title: BSSC Laboratory Assistant Recruitment 2025 – Apply Online
item.description: Bihar BSSC 10+2 Laboratory Assistant Recruitment 2025 के अंतर्गत बिहार कर्मचारी चयन आयोग (BSSC) ने कुल 143 लैबोरेटरी असिस्टेंट पदों के लिए भर्ती अधिसूचना जारी की है। इस भर्ती के लिए वे सभी उम्मीदवार आवेदन कर सकते हैं जिन्होंने किसी मान्यता प्राप्त बोर्ड से 10+2 (इंटरमीडिएट) विज्ञान संकाय से उत्तीर्ण किया हो। आवेदन प्रक्रिया 15 मई 2025 से शुरू हो चुकी है और अंतिम तिथि 14 जून 2025 निर्धारित की गई है। इस पद के लिए न्यूनतम आयु सीमा 18 वर्ष है और अधिकतम आयु सीमा श्रेणी के अनुसार 37 से 42 वर्ष तक निर्धारित की गई है। सामान्य, ओबीसी और अन्य राज्य के उम्मीदवारों के लिए आवेदन शुल्क ₹540 है, जबकि बिहार के SC, ST, महिला और दिव्यांग अभ्यर्थियों के लिए ₹135 है। चयन प्रक्रिया में प्रारंभिक परीक्षा (यदि आवेदन संख्या 40,000 से अधिक हो), मुख्य परीक्षा और दस्तावेज़ सत्यापन शामिल होंगे। चयनित उम्मीदवारों को ₹25,500 से ₹81,100 (पे लेवल 4) के वेतनमान पर नियुक्त किया जाएगा। इच्छुक अभ्यर्थी onlinebssc.com वेबसाइट के माध्यम से ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं।
